name: PABG: PLAYER ANIME BATTLEGROUNDS
description:
PABG: PLAYER ANIME BATTLEGROUNDS is a fast-paced action shooter!
Various maps, many types of weapons, different modes are waiting for you in which teams will come together in a battle for victory.

Features of BAND OF BROTHERS

At the moment, the game has implemented:
- different cards
- different modes
- many types of weapons
- various characters
- Lots of fun!
